skills.desc:
[Passive Effect]

Increases this Champion’s DEF each time they counterattack. DEF resets every time this Champion gets a turn.

When attacking, converts this Champion’s RES into additional ACC.

[Active Effect]

At the end of this Champion’s turn, places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn on all enemies under [Increase ATK] buffs.
skills.name: Laughing Gull [P]
